analysis.description:
FTN.multiSigWithdrawal (/unique_contracts/0x00000007b0390fc9ca72f534366f5c02d5af5334.sol#199-213) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- reqTime == 0 && reqAmount == 0
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x00000007b0390fc9ca72f534366f5c02d5af5334.sol#75-77) is not in mixedCase
